biocontainers.name: cat
biocontainers.summary: Cat/bat: tool for taxonomic classification of contigs and metagenome-assembled genomes (mags)

biotools.summary:
A robust hotspot identification platform for cosolvent simulations of proteins to expand the druggable proteome.
Cosolvent Analysis Toolkit (CAT).
Authors: Frances Sabanes Zariquiey, Joao V. de Souza, Agnieszka K. Bronowska.
